HTMLQuiz.question: What is the command for a header 1?
HTMLQuiz.feedback: The correct answer is h1. It is a header tag, but the tag h1  is used to add a header 1.

HTMLQuiz.question: What does HTML stand for?
HTMLQuiz.feedback: The correct answer is Hyper Text Markup Language. It is used on World Wide Web pages to display content on webpages.

HTMLQuiz.question: Which answers below are valid HTML tags?
HTMLQuiz.feedback: The correct answer is script  used to add Javascript and iframe  which embedes another doc into your HTML document. The tag used to create a form element is form , not formContent .

HTMLQuiz.question: You would add the title  element in the body of your page
HTMLQuiz.feedback: The title  would be defined in the head of your HTML.

HTMLQuiz.question: What does the following print out (hint: case-sensitive): p  Hello World /p
HTMLQuiz.feedback: The correct answer is : Hello World   |  Your response is case sensitive and your webpage only displays what is in between your tags.

HTMLQuiz.question: Once you deploy your site on the internet, what is the name of the address to access the site?
HTMLQuiz.feedback: The correct answer is URL. WWW or the World Wide Web is used to access your network and file:/ may be the path used to access files on your local machine. URL is the address used to access your site once it is deployed online.

HTMLQuiz.question: What language is used to style your HTML webpage?
HTMLQuiz.feedback: CSS is used to style element on your webpage, where Javascript and JQuery may be added for functionality or responsive design.

HTMLQuiz.question: Whic tag is used to add a photo to HTML?
HTMLQuiz.feedback: The correct answer is img  to add an image into your code. The others, picture  and image  are not valid.

HTMLQuiz.question: You cannot add Javascript into the body of your HTML.
HTMLQuiz.feedback: Javascript can be added internally or externally by using the script /script  tags in both the head and body of your code.

HTMLQuiz.question: Enter the tag used to add a paragraph element (do not use tags)
HTMLQuiz.feedback: The correct answer is p. It would be called in the HTML as p  Hello World /p

HTMLQuiz.question: What tag is used to define a table row?
HTMLQuiz.feedback: The correct answer is tr, which is known as table row, but is the syntax used.

HTMLQuiz.question: Which CSS attribute is used to change the color of font?
HTMLQuiz.feedback: The attribute to set the color of font is color. Font-color and fColor are not valid.

HTMLQuiz.question: Which attributes are used when adding an external CSS file to HTML?
HTMLQuiz.feedback: link  is used as the HTML tag, but is not an attribute.

HTMLQuiz.question: br  is used to add a new line
HTMLQuiz.feedback: br  is used to add a new line between elements.

HTMLQuiz.question: How many heading types are there?
HTMLQuiz.feedback: The correct answer is 6. They are h1 , h2 , h3 , h4 , h5 , h6

HTMLQuiz.question: What type of styling does span  add to your HTML?
HTMLQuiz.feedback: The correct answer is inline, as it does not create an extra space.

HTMLQuiz.question: What is the input type of a checkbox?
HTMLQuiz.feedback: The correct answer is checkbox type used when declaring a checkbox form.

HTMLQuiz.question: Why add CSS to HTML?
choices: Gives the page a unique design
answer: Gives the page a unique design
HTMLQuiz.feedback: The correct answer is all of the above. By adding CSS, more people will come to your site once they have a great user experience.

HTMLQuiz.question: !DOCTYPE html  comes from HTML4.
HTMLQuiz.feedback: !DOCTYPE html  comes from HTML5.

HTMLQuiz.question: What keyword forces a user to submit a form?
HTMLQuiz.feedback: The required keyword forces the user to enter a response before submitting.
